description: LDC and SIDS Targeted Portfolio Approach for Capacity Development and  mainstreaming of Sustainable Land Management

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: CIDA' Contribution is part of the co-financing for the overall budget for the LDC and SIDS Targeted Portfolio Approach for Capacity Development and Manistreaming for Sustainable Land Management project.  CIDA's contribution will be of C$450,000 over three years (c$150,000 per year).  It will target "technical assistance for capacity building" and/or "knowledge management and networking.
donor_long: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HR
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
